attributes.title: Glitch
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what Cheeto dust had planned to do but then as soon as I logged in it was asking VERY personal questions and was making me uncomfortable. Then when I was just scrolling Cheeto dust man would pop up and say something to me while I was in the middle of reading it. I quickly removed the app because it would glitch out too.

I downloaded this app to see what was going on with our lord and savior Cheeto man only to have the app take over TWO WEEKS to download. Of course I waiting because I was just so excited to open up the app only for it to be stuck on a white screen. I waited TWO WEEKS to be stuck with a white screen. I have never been so disappointed with an app in my life
